title: MyHeritage
summary: MyHeritage is an online genealogy platform with web, mobile, and software products and services that was first developed and popularized by the Israeli company MyHeritage in 2003.[2][3][4] Users of the platform can obtain their family trees, upload and browse through photos, and search through over 14 billion historical records, among other features.[5][6][7][8] As of 2020, the service supports 42 languages and has more than 50 million users worldwide who have built around 52 million family trees.[9][10] In 2016, it launched a genetic testing service called MyHeritage DNA. The company is headquartered in Or Yehuda, Israel[11] with additional offices in Tel Aviv, Israel,[12] Lehi, Utah,[13] Kyiv, Ukraine, and Burbank, California.
